parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
A linen cloth, a sheet, sail. Of uncertain affinity; a linen cloth, i.e. a sail.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: To send, let down, lower. From kata; and hiemi; to lower.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
Four. Or neuter tessara a plural number; four.
From archomai; a commencement, or chief.
